DOC.brief_summary: Exploratory study assessing the effect of three gonadotrophin protocols on Controlled Ovarian Stimulation (COS) parameters and IVF outcome in oocyte donors undergoing GnRH analogue (long protocol). 1,028 donors were randomized in three groups: Group I (n= 346) only r-FSH, Group II (n= 333) only HP-hMG and Group III (n= 349) r-FSH plus HP-hMG. IVF outcome of 1,059 oocyte recipients was compared.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Three Different Gonadotrophin Regimes on Egg Donation Program
DOC.criteria: healthy women 1834 years of age regular menstrual cycles no family history of hereditary or chromosomal diseases normal karyotype BMI 1829 Kg/m2 negative screening for sexually transmitted diseases women with PCOS were not included in this study
